Collect 30 points with this purchase Check store stock overlay Please use this overlay to check for product availability [ Product details ](javascript:void(0)) This balancing massage oil is a blend of ylang ylang, mandarin and vetiver essential oils in a skin-softening sweet almond oil base, to help ease the mind and restore inner balance. We've taken steps to reduce our impact on the planet at every stage in this product's journey. People tested. Formulated without parabens. - No Parabens, Phthalates, Mineral Oils & SLS - Not Tested on Animals - 100% Vegan - Sustainability Commitment Suitable for Adults and children aged 7 years and above How to use Apply directly to the skin for massage or add to the bath. Hazards and Cautions For external use only. Seek professional advice before using if you suffer from epilepsy, skin allergies, are pregnant or, are using homeopathic remedies. Avoid contact with eyes. If product gets into the eyes rinse well with water immediately. Not to be used on children under 7 years of age. Keep out of the sight and reach of children. Do not apply to irritated or broken skin. May stain clothing. Surfaces (e.g. bath) may become slippery after use. Storage Store in a cool, dry place. Ingredients Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Triticum Vulgare (Wheat) (Mandarin)
